title: Oregon Trail Gravel Grinder Overall Results: Cécile Lejeune and Hugo Drechou Take Overall Wins
content:
The third race in the Gravel Earth series concludes after five days of racing in the Oregon backcountry.

Read the full article at Oregon Trail Gravel Grinder Overall Results: Cécile Lejeune and Hugo Drechou Take Overall Wins on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
